answers.answer: I have same question im due feb 9 my baby weight 6lbs

my baby was weighing  in at about 4.5  lbs @ 31 wks. also alittle above average. im having another  ultrasound  at 36 wks to monitor  babies size again. i have been diagnosed with gestesinal diabetes thats why they are having  me do these additional ultrasounds. but dr said that even thought baby is alittle over the 75th percentile that its nothing to be worried  about. everyone  makes different  sized babies. i was expecting  a big baby even before i was diagnosed with GD. maybe get tested for GD but if you  already  have then your just  gonna have a big beautiful  baby i dont think that means she will come early. those weights are also just estimated they can be off by about  a pound  anyway.
My baby is due Feb. 27 and weighs 3 lbs 5oz
